ta.title: டெபாசிட் செய்யப்பட்ட வேட்பாளர்கள் பற்றிய கமிஷன் அறிவிப்பு

en.title: Commission notification about candidates who were deposited
body_lines: Four candidates have been backed by the Presidential election.
The Elections Commission (EPL) has informed this announcement.
Meanwhile, President Ranil Wickremesinghe, Sarath Keerthirath, Ocehala Herath and A. S. P. Are Liyanage.

summary_lines: The Elections Commission announced four candidates endorsed by President Ranil Wickremesinghe for the upcoming presidential election: Sarath Keerthirath, Ocehala Herath, and A.S.P. Are Liyanage.
